node.data: {"typ_h_about":"Periotris.js","cap_home":"主页","cap_github":"转到 GitHub 仓库（应用外）","typ_version":"版本：{{version}}","typ_revision":"修订：{{rev}}@{{branch}}","typ_license":"许可：{{license}}","typ_p_intro_1":"Periotris.js 是帮助记忆化学元素周期表的有力工具。","typ_p_intro_2":"通过将经典的俄罗斯方块（Tetris）玩法与元素周期表完美融合，Periotris.js 能够为枯燥的记忆过程带来活力与趣味。","typ_p_intro_3":"在这里，用游戏拼出元素周期表的梦想得以成为现实。通过熟悉的操作，你能够在挑战自己反应速度的同时，刷新自己对元素周期表排列的知识。为了成功完成挑战，你必须对所有元素的相对位置了如指掌——包括后几周期的重元素！尝试在最短的时间内完成元素周期表的拼搭，体验探索与成功的乐趣吧。","typ_p_intro_4_1":"本应用由 ","typ_p_intro_4_2":" 设计并编写。特别感谢宁波市效实中学的徐珑迪老师——是他的课程激发了作者的灵感，是他的支持让本项目得以开花结果。","typ_h_license":"许可信息","typ_p_license_1":"Copyright (C) 2021-present Rong \"Mantle\" Bao","typ_p_license_2":"This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.","typ_p_license_3":"This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.","typ_p_license_4_1":"You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see ","typ_p_license_4_2":"."}
